unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Festive Boost, Just in Time for Onam Travels!**
normalised: **E V Charging Gets a Festive Boost, Just in Time for Onam Travels!**

unnormalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety this Onam! EV charging infrastructure is getting a much-needed upgrade across Karnataka, just as families prepare for the big festive journeys.
normalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety this Onam! E V charging infrastructure is getting a much-needed upgrade across Karnataka, just as families prepare for the big festive journeys.

unnormalised: Ola Electric just announced a plan to install 10000 charging points across India by year-end, with a significant chunk earmarked for the southern states. Imagine driving your EV down to Kerala, knowing you can easily top up the battery and grab some delicious Onam Sadhya!
normalised: Ola Electric just announced a plan to install ten thousand charging points across India by year-end, with a significant chunk earmarked for the southern states. Imagine driving your E V down to Kerala, knowing you can easily top up the battery and grab some delicious Onam Sadhya!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is reportedly partnering with local kirana stores in tier-2 cities to install affordable charging stations. Think 'Bharat Charge' meets your neighbourhood grocery store - genius!
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is reportedly partnering with local kirana stores in tier two cities to install affordable charging stations. Think 'Bharat Charge' meets your neighbourhood grocery store slash genius!

unnormalised: However, concerns remain about the cost of charging at public stations, especially with tariffs fluctuating like Mumbai's weather. Industry experts recommend planning your route and utilizing apps like PlugShare to find the best deals.
normalised: However, concerns remain about the cost of charging at public stations, especially with tariffs fluctuating like Mumbai's weather. Industry experts recommend planning your route and utilizing apps like PlugShare to find the best deals.

unnormalised: "Nobody wants to shell out Rs. 500 to add just 100 km of range," quips Rohan, a Bengaluru-based EV enthusiast. "We need more affordable options to truly make EVs mainstream."
normalised: "Nobody wants to shell out rupees five hundred to add just one hundred kilometer of range," quips Rohan, a Bengaluru-based E V enthusiast. "We need more affordable options to truly make E Vs mainstream."

unnormalised: So, this Onam, plan your EV road trip smart and enjoy the scenic routes of God's Own Country – just remember to pack some extra Biryani for the journey!
normalised: So, this Onam, plan your E V road trip smart and enjoy the scenic routes of God's Own Country – just remember to pack some extra Biryani for the journey!
